page.title: 02SOUTHALL -EAST NEIGHBOURHOOD
page.content: Southall is my home town. I think Southall is a balanced place. There are lots of people of every different religion. Some people who do not live here think Southall is a bad place to live in but I don't think I would like to live anywhere else. You can make lots of friends and there is a lot of activities you can do,for instance swimming or jogging in our local parks. You can go to youth clubs on Tuesdays and Thursdays. There is a custom,called Divali which Asian people have yearly in October or November. It is a festival of light, and we celebrate it by giving food to friends and relatives and children and watching fireworks. Most shops stay open late. Many people have videos so people don't have to go to the cinema. S Dhillon, R Modeshia,A Bains, S Bhogal, R Saigal
